channel.title: Clément Allavena's personal website
channel.description: Recent content on Clément Allavena's personal website

item.title: About Me
item.description: I’m a Student in two year university diploma in IT at the Université Clermont Auvergne. Passionate about IT since childhood, in my website I regroup all of my project. I live in Clermont-Ferrand, France and I like to play sports, I practice Martial Arts that i’ve been doing for 8 years now. You can find me working at the IUT or at metting like the MUG in Clermont-Ferrand or at the gym.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Here is a sample of my projects: CoFiAppV1 - Community Film Application, develop in C#.Net with WPF interface Site News RSS - A news website automated with the RSS technology PixelArtDesign[WIP] - An Android application of colorisation of pixelized images
